segment.source: How to Uninstall the App-V 5.0 Client
segment.target: How to Uninstall the App-V 5.0 Client

segment.source: How to Uninstall the App-V 5.0 Client
segment.target: How to Uninstall the App-V 5.0 Client

segment.source: How to Uninstall the App-V 5.0 Client
segment.target: How to Uninstall the App-V 5.0 Client

segment.source: Use the following procedure to uninstall the App-V 5.0 client from a computer.
segment.target: Use the following procedure to uninstall the App-V 5.0 client from a computer.

segment.source: When you uninstall the App-V 5.0 client all packages published to the computer running the client are also removed.
segment.target: When you uninstall the App-V 5.0 client all packages published to the computer running the client are also removed.

segment.source: If the uninstall operation does not complete the packages will need to be re-published to the computer running the App-V 5.0 client.
segment.target: If the uninstall operation does not complete the packages will need to be re-published to the computer running the App-V 5.0 client.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: You should ensure that the App-V 5.0 client service is running prior to performing the uninstall procedure.
segment.target: You should ensure that the App-V 5.0 client service is running prior to performing the uninstall procedure.

segment.source: To uninstall the App-V 5.0 Client
segment.target: To uninstall the App-V 5.0 Client

segment.source: In Control Panel, double-click ProgramsUninstall a Program, and then double-click Microsoft Application Virtualization Client.
segment.target: In Control Panel, double-click ProgramsUninstall a Program, and then double-click Microsoft Application Virtualization Client.

segment.source: In the dialog box that appears, click Yes to continue with the uninstall process.
segment.target: In the dialog box that appears, click Yes to continue with the uninstall process.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The uninstall process cannot be canceled or interrupted.
segment.target: The uninstall process cannot be canceled or interrupted.

segment.source: A progress bar shows the time remaining.
segment.target: A progress bar shows the time remaining.

segment.source: When this step finishes, you must restart the computer so that all associated drivers can be stopped to complete the uninstall process.
segment.target: When this step finishes, you must restart the computer so that all associated drivers can be stopped to complete the uninstall process.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You can also use the command line to uninstall the App-V 5.0 client with the following switch: /UNINSTALL.
segment.target: You can also use the command line to uninstall the App-V 5.0 client with the following switch: /UNINSTALL.

segment.target: Got a suggestion for App-V?
